label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_005
content:
## 2026-01-07 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: axfr_requests 33 | axfr_success_pct 100.0% | ixfr_requests 198 | ixfr_success_pct 99.5% | transfer_avg_ms 510 | transfer_p95_ms 1185 | tsig_failures 0
- /ttl-changes: records_changed 55 | zones_touched 8 | ttl_min_s 300 | ttl_max_s 43200 | ttl_median_s 3600 | rollbacks 1
- /propagation: cloud_edge_sites 34 | propagation_avg_s 62 | propagation_p95_s 150 | stale_answer_pct 0.2%
- /dns-queries: qps_avg 20100 | qps_peak 46500 | nx_domain_pct 2.2% | servfail_pct 0.04% | udp_pct 97.1% | tcp_fallback_pct 1.3%
- /dnssec: zones_signed 54 | signing_queue_depth 1 | signature_refreshes 109 | ds_mismatch_count 0 | bogus_validation_events 0
- /health-checks: authoritative_reachability_pct 99.99% | soa_serial_mismatch_count 0 | lame_delegation_count 0
- /change-mgmt: change_requests 5 | changes_applied 5 | changes_failed 0 | mean_time_to_apply_min 16
- /cache-behavior: resolver_cache_hit_pct 88.6% | negative_cache_hit_pct 38.9% | prefetch_enabled_pct 70.0%
- /latency: auth_response_avg_ms 17.1 | auth_response_p95_ms 40.8 | edns0_present_pct 73.5%
- /errors: format_error_count 6 | refused_count 26 | rate_limited_count 9 | truncation_tc_pct 0.4%
- /capacity: zones_total 544 | records_total 1931200 | dynamic_updates_per_hr 295
- /compliance: zonefile_lint_errors 2 | dnssec_policy_violations 0 | audit_log_gaps 0

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 29% | Mem 61% | Disk 72% | Conns: 1232 | Net: 74/100 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 25% | Mem 51% | Disk 55% | Conns: 1068 | Net: 65/80 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 48% | Mem 66% | Disk 47% | Conns: N/A | Net: 92/126 Mbps | Queue depth 3
- signer-01: CPU 34% | Mem 70% | Disk 59% | Conns: N/A | Net: 15/19 Mbps | HSM slot utilization 54%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active N | idle N | waiting N | exhaustion: N | max: N | avg_wait: Xms
(Note: Specific pool data not provided in data sheet)

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.6% | Bandwidth: N/A | Origin requests: N/A
- Negative cache hit rate: 38.9%
- Prefetch enabled: 70.0%

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNS zone transfer success on hostname: 0
- [INFO] TTL change rollback occurred
- [INFO] Propagation delay average at 62s
- [INFO] Cache hit rate at 88.6%
- [INFO] DNSSEC signatures refreshed 109 times
- [INFO] Change requests applied successfully
- [INFO] Latency auth response average 17.1ms
- [INFO] Errors: 6 format errors, 26 refused, 9 rate-limited, 0.4% truncation
- [INFO] Capacity: 544 zones, 1,931,200 records, 295 dynamic updates/hr
- [INFO] Zonefile lint errors: 2

### Deployments & Changes
- Added 16 zones to cloud-managed DNS; completed NS delegation tests from 10 external resolvers.
- Rolled TTL standardization for 8 zones; one rollback for CDN alias due to partner requirement of 300.
- Enabled prefetch for additional resolver POPs; cache hit rate improved.
- Updated runbook to reflect cloud sync controller ownership; decommissioned old on-prem monitoring checks.

### Events
- Added 16 zones to cloud DNS; NS delegation tests completed.
- Rolled TTL standardization for 8 zones; one rollback for CDN alias.
- Enabled prefetch for resolver POPs; cache hit rate improved.
- Closed old on-prem monitoring checks; updated runbook.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: J. Silva. 1 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Stable; migration progressing on schedule with minor TTL exception.
